com.pcloud.sdk

Interface ApiClient.Builder

  • Enclosing interface:
    ApiClient

    public static interface ApiClient.Builder
    A builder for configuring an creating new ApiClient instances.
    See Also:
    ApiClient, ApiClient.newBuilder(), PCloudSdk.newClientBuilder()

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • cache

        ApiClient.Builder cache(okhttp3.Cache cache)
        Parameters:
        cache - the response cache to be used to read and write cached responses. If null, no cache will be used.
        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance
        See Also:
        Cache

      • connectionPool

        ApiClient.Builder connectionPool(okhttp3.ConnectionPool connectionPool)
        Parameters:
        connectionPool - the connectionPool used to recycle connections. If unset, a new connection pool with a default configuration will be used.
        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance
        See Also:
        ConnectionPool

      • dispatcher

        ApiClient.Builder dispatcher(okhttp3.Dispatcher dispatcher)
        Parameters:
        dispatcher - the Dispatcher used to set policy and execute asynchronous requests. If unset, a new dispatcher with a default configuration will be used.
        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance
        See Also:
        Dispatcher

      • withClient

        ApiClient.Builder withClient(okhttp3.OkHttpClient client)
        Use an existing OkHttpClient instance and share the Dispatcher, ConnectionPool and Cache

        Must not be null.

        Previous calls to dispatcher(Dispatcher), connectionPool(ConnectionPool), Cache will be overridden by this call.

        Parameters:
        client - a non-null OkHttpClient to be shared
        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance
        See Also:
        OkHttpClient

      • readTimeout

        ApiClient.Builder readTimeout(long timeout,
                              java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Parameters:
        timeout - the read timeout for new connections.

        A value of 0 means no timeout, otherwise values must be between 1 and Integer.MAX_VALUE when converted to milliseconds.

        timeUnit - the unit of the timeout argument
        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance

      • writeTimeout

        ApiClient.Builder writeTimeout(long timeout,
                               java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Parameters:
        timeout - the write timeout for new connections.

        A value of 0 means no timeout, otherwise values must be between 1 and Integer.MAX_VALUE when converted to milliseconds.

        timeUnit - the unit of the timeout argument
        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance

      • connectTimeout

        ApiClient.Builder connectTimeout(long timeout,
                                 java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Parameters:
        timeout - the connect timeout for new connections.

        A value of 0 means no timeout, otherwise values must be between 1 and Integer.MAX_VALUE when converted to milliseconds.

        timeUnit - the unit of the timeout argument
        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance

      • authenticator

        ApiClient.Builder authenticator(Authenticator authenticator)
        Parameters:
        authenticator - the Authenticator instance to be used for authentication when making calls to pCloud's API.

        If set to null, no authentication will be performed.

        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance
        See Also:
        Authenticator

      • callbackExecutor

        ApiClient.Builder callbackExecutor(java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor)
        Parameters:
        callbackExecutor - an executor to be used when invoking Callback and ProgressListener instance methods.

        If set to null, the methods will be called on the thread executing th request to pCloud's API.

        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance
        See Also:
        Executor

      • progressCallbackThreshold

        ApiClient.Builder progressCallbackThreshold(long bytes)
        Define a progress notifications threshold

        If set, a supplied ProgressListener instance will be invoked on no less than bytes of transferred data.

        Can be used to control thread congestion caused by the invocations of the progress listener.

        Parameters:
        bytes - the minimal amounts of bytes to be transferred before notifying about a transfer progress
        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance
        See Also:
        ProgressListener, ApiClient.createFile(long, String, DataSource, Date, ProgressListener), ApiClient.download(FileLink, DataSink, ProgressListener), RemoteData.download(DataSink, ProgressListener)

      • apiHost

        ApiClient.Builder apiHost(java.lang.String apiHost)
        Set a specific pCloud API host.

        if not specifically set, the produced ApiClient will use api.pcloud.com.

        Parameters:
        apiHost - a valid pCloud API host. (api.pcloud.com, eapi.pcloud.com)
        Returns:
        the same ApiClient.Builder instance

      • create

        ApiClient create()
        Create a new ApiClient from the provided configuration.
        Returns:
        a new non-null ApiClient object
        See Also:
        ApiClient
